briefTitle: Docetaxel+Carboplatin vs Epirubicin+Cyclophosphamide Followed by Docetaxel as Adjuvant Treatment in Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Docetaxel Plus Carboplatin Versus Epirubicin Plus Cyclophosphamide Followed by Docetaxel as Adjuvant Treatment in Triple-negative Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Triple-negative breast cancer
* Older than 18 years old
* Have tumor resection surgery
* Sufficient organ function (marrow, heart, liver)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Other malignancy
* Other serious disease( marrow, heart, liver)
